storyInfo: Michael recalls how Laura fell to her death, and wants to escape the plate with Marion. Lucian is increasingly certain that the Troupe Leader is here. He recalls his reasons for escaping the troupe, and once again resolves to kill its leader.

attributes.content: Mr. Dalton! You really got that extra scene for me! And it's a wire stunt to boot?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: How did you get Director Quay to agree so easily, when he wouldn't budge when I asked him?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Greta personally recruited me as lead actor. Steven wouldn't dare turn down my requests.
attributes.name: Dalton

attributes.content: This is my first time in a wire rig... I'll never forget this opportunity you gave me! Okay, I have to go prepare now!
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Sure, go on.
attributes.name: Dalton

attributes.content: Now you're acting all humble? Might've even fooled me, if I didn't already know you were trying to get Steven to mess with my role behind my back.
attributes.name: Dalton

attributes.content: First time in a wire rig, huh... Good to hear.
attributes.name: Dalton

attributes.content: Rookies should know their places. Now you'll be a good sport and take it, right? Even if you're left hanging for hours?
attributes.name: Dalton

attributes.content: Shelly! I just got another scene and I need the wire rig. Can you prepare it for me?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: I know you're passionate about acting. But how many extra scenes is this now? Do you even realize how much you've screwed with the schedule I made for the entire crew?
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Do you feel even an ounce of guilt, Princess? I'm not changing the entire schedule again because of you. This crew doesn't revolve around you.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Shelly. I'm not trying to increase your workload, honest. But Mr. Dalton said the director signed off on it...
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Dalton did?
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Alright then.
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Thanks, Shelly!
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: (He was just telling me how you have no respect for your seniors in the field. No way did he do this out of pure kindness.)
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: (The wire rig, huh?)
attributes.name: Shelly

attributes.content: Hello, Laura! You look wonderful today! Not many actors would be so happy to do an aerial stunt!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Well, I've never been so excited! This scene will be the only one in the movie that belongs entirely to me. I want to knock it out of the ballpark!
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Well, aren't you just adorable?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Try not to get hurt though. And if you're tired, you can always come find me in my room. I'll be there all night...
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Oh, Marion! Have you come to touch up Michael's makeup?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: I have to go prepare. See you later!
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Yeah, see you in hell, bitch!
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: D-Don't be angry with me, Mari.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I look away for one moment and you're flirting with another woman! Are you tired of me already?
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: You've been making eyes at her on the set too... If you like younger women that much, how about you let her do your makeup from now on?
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: Please, babe, I'm serious about you.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I won't talk to her from now on, I swear!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: ...You swear?
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: I swear!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I'm familiar with your vices by now, but this is an important time for your career. Don't screw it up, and don't let me down.
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: That Laura girl is a loud-mouthed show-off. I'm sure she's up to something. You can do better.
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: Keep your distance from her.
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: No talking to her, and no physical contact. Even if she's dying right in front of you, that's none of your business... got it?
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: Babe?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: He can tell from Marion's eyes that she is not joking.
Alright, I promise.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: It's still not my turn? What's going on?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: There's something on Mr. Dalton's end, and everyone on the set's gone over. No one's giving orders now... Look, we've even got that rookie still hanging up there.
attributes.name: Staff

attributes.content: Oh, poor thing.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: You never struck me as the compassionate type. Trying to get her in bed?
attributes.name: Staff

attributes.content: Hey, you know me.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Let me go check on our poor little beauty...
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I promised Mari this morning that I wouldn't approach her, but...
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: We never said anything about her coming to me, right?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Michael looks up and sees Laura's slender frame hanging in mid-air. Her dripping sweat has formed a small puddle on the floor.
She is tired, but her eyes remain strong, stinging Michael's frivolous heart.
The wire rig is creaking. From experience, Michael can tell there is something wrong with it.
However—
All the better for me, yeah?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: She'll call for help once she realizes something's not right.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I'll be her hero and have the perfect excuse for a little tête-à-tête, all without breaking my promise to Mari.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I'll let her hang a little longer.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Why aren't you calling for help, Laura? I'm right here, you know!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: It's been hours, and the rope's sounding increasingly off... Where did this equipment even come from? How could it be so ancient?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Is that a crack around the belt? She has to have noticed that!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: No, I have to tell her, I have to...
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: He walks forward, stepping in the puddle of sweat. The heat of the limelight is causing Laura to become dehydrated.
Michael will never understand her determination, her passion. It is as though she is denying everything he is.
Ahem.
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: Michael turns around to find Marion standing in the far corner, gazing at him and the exhausted actress with cold eyes.
'Even if she's dying right in front of you, that's none of your business... got it?'
Michael strokes his orange ears and stops in his tracks.
...Well, it really is none of my business if she chooses to suffer.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: That's your first lesson, Laura.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Never be too serious. Always put yourself first, even if you have to hurt others. That's the most important thing—
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Creak, creak.
The rope above his head is being stretched to its limit.
You're still not going to call for help?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Aaaahhhhhh—!!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Michael?
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: What's going on? What were you thinking about?
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: I came with you to the makeup room for an explanation, not to watch you melt down.
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: What did Moira mean when she said you wanted to leave the plate?
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: We have to get out of here, babe!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.text: \n\nVictoria's famous Crimson Troupe is here in Daremont for three days! Don't miss it!

attributes.content: It's the first time you've left the castle and traveled so far with the troupe, isn't it?
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Young Lucian

attributes.content: Are you nervous?
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: ...I'm fine, Master.
attributes.name: Young Lucian

attributes.content: The others are playing the leads. I'm just a very minor role, watching from the side in most of my scenes...
attributes.name: Young Lucian

attributes.content: When the true performance unfolds before your eyes, it is not easy to resist the urge to run.
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: You've learned another lesson today, child.
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.text: Police statement on the Daremont Case:
\n\nAt this time, there is no evidence linking the case to the Crimson Troupe which passed through the area recently. The police has established a special task force to investigate.

attributes.content: A spire in Lupukarn, Leithanien
(Claps)
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: A splendid performance.
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: You've finally made a breakthrough after your first performance as the lead.
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: The tiny black crystal on your neck is almost perfectly hidden. The audience sees only the glamorous star, not the Infected approaching death one step at a time.
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: Your performance is increasingly mature, and your songs move the passions. There is virtually no stiffness, no pretentiousness.
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: Are you complimenting me?
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: Are you not going? Or do you want to stay, and take in the aftertaste of the stage?
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: Aftertaste?
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: You mean the taste of blood?
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Excuse me, Mister, please let me through.
attributes.name: Innocent Child

attributes.content: I want to go home.
attributes.name: Innocent Child

attributes.content: I think the Crimson Troupe can take her in.
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: Take her in?
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: She doesn't know that her home is gone. She doesn't know that some of the people before her still have her family's blood on them...
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: That is what we'd call a fateful encounter, is it not?
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: As it was with you and the Troupe.
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: Perhaps you should teach her yourself. Teach her how to blend in, how to embrace a new life... how to walk the path that you have.
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: The show goes on, even once we've left the stage?
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Ah, you remember what I said.
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: Yes, there is no drama like life. The aesthetics of destiny are never bound by any medium.
attributes.name: Troupe Leader

attributes.content: ...Mister?
attributes.name: Innocent Child

attributes.content: What do you think, Lucian?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Have you decided? You're in a position to make a choice now, aren't you?
attributes.name: Abyss

attributes.content: Are you awake?
attributes.name: Miss.Christine

attributes.content: (Lazy yawn)
attributes.name: Miss.Christine

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: The bitterness of obsession... your emotions.
attributes.name: Miss.Christine

attributes.content: A challenge to the palate?
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: I wouldn't say that.
attributes.name: Miss.Christine

attributes.content: But your flashbacks have become increasingly frequent since we came to this plate.
attributes.name: Miss.Christine

attributes.content: That means we're getting closer to him.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: You noticed the strangeness of that coordinator.
attributes.name: Miss.Christine

attributes.content: As did you.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Unfortunately, she was visited by tragedy before I could extract any more clues.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: You used that camera assistant to break the news of the Catastrophe?
attributes.name: Miss.Christine

attributes.content: It was too much a coincidence for that document to show up when it did, the way it did.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: When one's been in enough plays, it's not hard to realize that such an obvious clue is bound to be a trigger.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Dalton's death was only the beginning.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: The plot devices have been set, and their developments foreshadowed. The curtain has been raised, and it cannot be lowered again.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: And the author will not appear until the story reaches the climax.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: ...Only then can I kill him.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: (Yawn)
attributes.name: Miss.Christine

attributes.content: Be careful, Lucian.
attributes.name: Miss.Christine

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: What I mean is, be careful of yourself.
attributes.name: Miss.Christine

attributes.content: As I said, your emotions are filled with the bitterness of obsession... It's a dangerous thing.
attributes.name: Miss.Christine

attributes.content: I apologize, Miss.Christine.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: You will not have to endure it for long.
attributes.name: Lucian
